summary: A US professor of archaeology and his young research team uncover a sealed ancient pagan tomb under the mausoleum of the real life Roman Emperor Domitian. This unleashes an evil deity that starts haunting people involved with the dig.
cast: John R. Pepper|Trine Michelsen|Donald Pleasence|Massimo De Rossi|Riccardo De Torrebruna|Lavinia Grizi|Riccardo Parisio Perrotti|Giovanni Bilancia|Matteo Gazzolo|Laurentina Guidotti|Erna Schurer|Giovanni Tamberi|Marco Tullio Cau
title: Espectros
